Name: Union Macir
Notes: Macir is possibly Latin for "Mace", Pulsare is Latin for "To knock at".

Name: Union Arcus
Effect: Multitude of arrows fall straight down from the sky.
Notes: Arcus is Latin for "Bow", Sagitta is Latin for "Arrow".

Name: Evanescere
Effect: Forward criss-crossing fire and ice wave attack.

Name: Universitas
Effect: Wide area tear in space with time stop.

Name: Union Lapiste
Effect: Giant stone fists smash against each other from the left and right.

Name: Union Nitesco
Notes: Nitesco is Latin for "To Begin Shining", Nitens is Latin for "Beaming".

Name: Union Ignis
Effect: Forward two criss-crossing fireball wave attack.

Name: Union Fulgur
Notes: Fulgur is Latin for "Lightning", Tonitrus is Latin for "Thunder".

Name: Union Luminatio
Effect: Damaging Light Ball appears on each enemy.

Name: Union Umbra
Effect: Damaging Dark Ball appears on each enemy.

Name: Dominus
Effect: Special: Kills everything on the screen, including
